summary:
< FORCEWITHIN ENB PRESET >   V2.0 BETA UPDATED!!!
A \"Semi\" Realistic (Somewhat Cinematic) look with all the latest 1.13 ENB features. SSAO, IL, Bokeh DOF, Godrays.

Based off Jasmin ENB real Graphic Mod.
A fairly Powerful PC required is required for this preset.
descriptionHtml:
[size=8]NEW 2.0 BETA VERSION[/size]

[img]http://i.minus.com/i8ZWwrncAqf3J.jpg[/img]

Modified ENB based off Jasmin ENB real Graphic Mod.

For credits see the bottom of readme.

A fairly Powerful PC required is required for this preset as it includes all the latest ENB features.

My PC specs are: i5 750 @ 4.0ghz/ nVidia Geforce 680GTX 2GB/ 8GB of RAM.

[Downloadable Files Required]

ENBSeries v0.113 for TES Skyrim by Boris
[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm]HERE[/url]

[Installation]
(1) From enbseries_skyrim_v0113.zip, extract ONLY *d3d9.dll* (inside the WrapperVersion folder)and place inside the main Skyrim folder

(2) From FORCEWITHIN_ENB extract everything EXCEPT for *Further Dark Dungeons for ENB.esp* into your Skyrim main folder.

(3) Extract *Further Dark Dungeons for ENB.esp* into your Skyrim data folder.

(4) Make sure you activate the *Further Dark Dungeons for ENB.esp* in your mod loader of choice and make sure it loads after any mod that modifies interior cell space.(Realistic Lighting, Interior, More Dynamic Shadows and Dungeon Fog Remover for example)

(5) Ensure to set bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 inside your skyrimprefs.ini

(6) Have fun!

[Optional presets]
I have added a number of presets that some users may want inside the Optional presets folder. To use, choose a preset then enter that folder and copy any and all files to the same folder that the ENB mod is in (should be the main Skyrim folder or nothing will work).

[Troubleshooting]
-There are minor graphical bugs that occur as a result of the SSAO(Screen Space Ambient Occlusion) feature. These may include see through arms and weapons of the player character(1st person view) in very dark lighting situations and also transparency water issues in certain lighing situations. These cannot be fixed as they are a bug within ENB itself and only Boris(the great author of ENB) can ever fix them. If a fix is released I\'ll probably include it in a later version. I have added a preset without SSAO if you wish to do without it.

-The SSAO feature is also known to cause long loading times too. To alleviate this you can press SHIFT+F12 to turn ENB off during a loading screen and then pressing the same to turn it back on after loading has finished. Annoying aye :(

[Version History]

Version 2.0 BETA
-Overhauled fog values again. Should be more natural now.
-Implemented and tweaked Matso\'s new bloom and DOF code. (Thanks Matso!)
-Added Chromatic Abberation into default DOF preset and made optional No Chroma preset.
-More tweaks to Day and Night brightness values.

Version 1.1 :
-Major tweaks/fixes to Distance Fog.
-Updated and \'tightened\' DOF values.
-Tweaks to night brightness and contrast settings.
-Tweaks to day brightness.
-Added (No DOF)(Reduced DOF)(Reduced DOF + No Bokeh)(No Bokeh)(No SSAO)(No SSAO + DOF) and (No Chromatic Abberation) presets

Version 1.0 :
-Initial release.

[CREDITS]
[url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]Boris Vorontsov (ENB Series creator)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12549]Jasmin ENB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4142]HeliosDoubleSix AKA HD6[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19379]Matso : For Bokeh DOF effects and new bloom code[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454]Mindflux : Dark Dungeons for ENB[/url]
author: ForceWithin
